hero.title: Empowering Dreams Across Africa
hero.subtitle: Roberto Save Dreams Foundation is dedicated to creating sustainable opportunities through education, microfinance, and community development.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Since 2015, we've been working with communities across Africa to create lasting change.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to pursue their dreams. Through targeted programs in education, microfinance, and sustainable development, we empower individuals and communities to create lasting change.

featuredPrograms.title: Our Programs
featuredPrograms.description: We focus on three key areas to create sustainable impact and empower communities.

programs.title: Education
programs.description: Providing access to quality education through scholarships, school construction, and teacher training.

programs.title: Microloans
programs.description: Empowering entrepreneurs with small loans, business training, and mentorship to build sustainable livelihoods.

programs.title: Sustainable Development
programs.description: Supporting community-led initiatives in agriculture, clean water, renewable energy, and healthcare.

featuredStory.title: Featured Success Story
featuredStory.description: Meet Maria, whose life was transformed through our education program.

testimonialSection.title: Voices from Our Community
testimonialSection.description: Hear from the people whose lives have been impacted by our programs.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: There are many ways to support our mission and make a difference.

options.title: Donate
options.description: Your contribution helps fund our programs and create lasting impact.

options.title: Volunteer
options.description: Share your skills and time to support our mission on the ground.

options.title: Partner
options.description: Organizations can partner with us to amplify our collective impact.

options.title: Apply
options.description: Apply for our programs if you're eligible and in need of support.

blog.title: Latest News
blog.description: Stay updated with our latest activities, impact stories, and announcements.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on our work and ways to get involved.
